etri.sdn.controller.module.staticentrypusher

Interface IStaticFlowEntryPusherService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OFMStaticFlowEntryPusher

    public interface IStaticFlowEntryPusherService
extends IService
    This interface represents a service that the implementation of interface provides to other IRIS modules.
    Author:
    shkang

    • Method Detail

      • addFlow

        void addFlow(java.lang.String name,
           org.openflow.protocol.OFFlowMod fm,
           java.lang.String swDpid)
        Adds a static flow.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the flow mod. Must be unique.
        fm - The flow to push.
        swDpid - The switch DPID to push it to, in 00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01 notation.

      • deleteFlow

        boolean deleteFlow(java.lang.String name)
        Deletes a static flow
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the static flow to delete.

      • deleteFlowsForSwitch

        void deleteFlowsForSwitch(long dpid)
        Deletes all static flows for a practicular switch
        Parameters:
        dpid - The DPID of the switch to delete flows for.

      • deleteAllFlows

        void deleteAllFlows()
        Deletes all flows.

      • getFlows

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.openflow.protocol.OFFlowMod>> getFlows()
        Gets all list of all flows. The first key is the DPID, and the second key is the name of flow-mod record (for example, 'flow-mod-1').

      • getFlows

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.openflow.protocol.OFFlowMod> getFlows(java.lang.String dpid)
        Gets a list of flows by switch. The first key is the name of flow-mod record (for example, 'flow-mod-1').
